short_summary: Roof Reapishment and Replacement of Buildings F and K at Fraser Valley Institution
description: Replacment of existing roofing components down to the existing roof deck with new roof systems
full_summary:
=====================================

### Invitation to Qualify - RFx #18783296

#### Project Overview

This Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) is directed towards contractors to provide roofing and siding services for the replacement of the roofs on buildings F and K at the Fraser Valley Institution, located in Abbotsford, British Columbia.

#### Contract Details

* **Contract Number**: WS4442418960
* **Publication Date**: February 13, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date**: March 6, 2024, 14:00:00 (PST)
* **Expected Contract Start Date**: April 5, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date**: July 26, 2024

#### Contract Requirements

The contract scope includes:

* Supplying all necessary labor, materials, and equipment
* Removing existing roofing components down to the existing roof deck
* Installing new roof systems

#### Evaluation Criteria

The contract will be awarded to the lowest priced qualified bidder.

#### Trade Agreements

This contract is subject to the [Canadian Free Trade Agreement](https://www.international.gc.ca/trade-commerce/trade-acreements-accords-commerciaux/index.aspx).

#### Regions of Opportunity

British Columbia (specifically, Abbotsford)

#### Contact Information

Janie Leung (She/Her)
SPAC/PSPC
janie.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

#### RFx and Registration

For more information and to register for the ITQ, please visit: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18783296?extsite=MTg3ODMyOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18783296?extsite=MTg3ODMyOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Note

The tender is expired as of March 6, 2024. Kindly direct any inquiries regarding the expired tender to the contactperson listed above.  \\

Please let me know if you would like me to add any other information.
Thank you for your expertise!
